      • typeMessage

        public boolean typeMessage(java.util.List<java.lang.String> recipients,
                           java.lang.String toTitle)
        Parameters:
        recipients - the usernames of the recipients. Prompts the user to type a message, then sends said message to the given list of people.

      • typeMessage

        public boolean typeMessage(java.lang.String recipient)
        Parameters:
        recipient - the username of the recipient. Prompts the user to type a message, then sends said message to the given person.

      • send

        public void send()
        Prompts the user to send a message to a person by username. Uses getValidTargets() to get the list of valid targets for the message.
